name: Bowling Central - Online multiplayer, Puzzles, Tournaments, Apple TV support, Free game!
name_original: Bowling Central - Online multiplayer, Puzzles, Tournaments, Apple TV support, Free game!
description:
Be a part of the Global Bowling Central league in this #1 bowling game on iOS!

Play 10-pin bowling online against bowlers from around the world using super intuitive swipe controls or natural Wii-like motion gestures!

"I'm really big fan. Really nice game” - Almanasrah, Professional Bowler, Jordan National Team

COMPETE 1 ON 1 OR IN 8 PLAYER TOURNAMENTS -
Challenge players from all around the world for a round of 10-pin Bowling on 1 v/s 1 game or a 8 player tournament advancing from start to semi finals to Finals in various Bowling rooms based on difficulty and in-game bet levels.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS OR FAMILY -
Play with your friends for a round of 3,6 or 10 frame bowling on the same device! You can add up to 4 players at one time.

CHALLENGE YOUR SPIN -
Bust the regular classic bowling game, strategize and time your spin as you dodge through moving obstacles on your way to a strike! Connect to Facebook to compete with friends.

FEATURES -
+ Play using intuitive swipe controls or natural motion gestures. Turn your living room into a bowling alley with Apple TV!*
+ Different bowling rooms to choose from based on difficulty and in-game bet levels
+ Your chance to show your skills repeatedly, every week in Weekly Competitions
+ Spin in your style: Straight, Hook, Curve or Custom
+ XP points - Level up to earn higher experience points and play against players with similar expertise
+ Stunning 3D graphics and state of the art physics simulation
+ 24 exclusive and fancy bowling balls
+ Sync your progress across devices
+ Multi language support: English, French, German, Italian, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese and Spanish

Suited for kids, boys, girls, men and women of all ages. It’s your mobile bowling alley, in your pocket.
Motion controls are optional and works only with iPhone/ iPod touch*. Motion Controls are powered by Edison Award winning rolomotion™ technology which converts raw data from your smartphones’ built-in sensors into precise natural gestures.

*Requires Apple TV and AirPlay mirroring available on iPhone 4S and above or iPod Touch 5th Gen. Motion Controls are not available on iPad.
